text: Ezhudesam is a town panchayat in Kanniyakumari district in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. ==Demographics== At the 2001 India census, Ezhudesam had a population of 18,652. Males constituted 50% of the population and females 50%. Ezhudesam had an average literacy rate of 80%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy was 83%, and female literacy was 77%. 10% of the population was under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Kanyakumari district
title: Ezhudesam
